name: Magistus Maiden Artemis
text:
1 Level 4 or lower Spellcaster monster
You can only Special Summon "Magistus Maiden Artemis(s)" once per turn. If another "Magistus" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned while this monster is on the field: You can target 1 of those monsters; equip this card you control to it. While this card is equipped to a monster: You can add 1 "Magistus" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Magistus Maiden Artemis" once per turn.
